an1.150:1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anapattim apattiti dipenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanaahitaya patipanna bahujanaasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
an1.150:1.2: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu apunnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam antaradhapenti”ti.
an1.151:1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu apattim anapattiti dipenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanaahitaya patipanna bahujanaasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
an1.151:1.2: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu apunnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam antaradhapenti”ti.
an1.152-159:1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu lahukam apattim garuka apattiti dipenti …pe… garukam apattim lahuka apattiti dipenti …pe… dutthullam apattim adutthulla apattiti dipenti …pe… adutthullam apattim dutthulla apattiti dipenti …pe… savasesam apattim anavasesa apattiti dipenti …pe… anavasesam apattim savasesa apattiti dipenti …pe… sappatikammam apattim appatikamma apattiti dipenti …pe… appatikammam apattim sappatikamma apattiti dipenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanaahitaya patipanna bahujanaasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
an1.152-159:1.2: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu apunnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam antaradhapenti”ti.
an1.160:1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anapattim anapattiti dipenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanahitaya patipanna bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an1.160:1.2: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu punnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam thapenti”ti.
an1.161:1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu apattim apattiti dipenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanahitaya patipanna bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an1.161:1.2: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu punnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam thapenti”ti.
an1.162-169:1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu lahukam apattim lahuka apattiti dipenti … garukam apattim garuka apattiti dipenti … dutthullam apattim dutthulla apattiti dipenti … adutthullam apattim adutthulla apattiti dipenti … savasesam apattim savasesa apattiti dipenti … anavasesam apattim anavasesa apattiti dipenti … sappatikammam apattim sappatikamma apattiti dipenti … appatikammam apattim appatikamma apattiti dipenti;
an1.162-169:1.2: te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanahitaya patipanna bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an1.162-169:1.3: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu punnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam thapenti”ti.
